intro: Men <1>front-end dasturchiman</1>, <3>Next.js</3> va <5>TypeScript</5> texnologiyalarida ishlayman. Ijtimoiy tarmoqlar yoki ushbu manzil orqali bog‘lanishingiz mumkin: <7>abdukhamidov0904@gmail.com</7>
title: Tajriba
point1: Responsiv va interaktiv web ilovalar yaratish (React, Next.js, TypeScript).
point2: UI/UX dizaynni kodga aylantirish va mijozlar ehtiyojiga moslashtirish.
point3: Tailwind CSS & Shadcn orqali zamonaviy komponentlar ishlab chiqish.
point4: Web sahifalarni SEO va performansga mos optimallashtirish.
